data.title: I don't know where to start! Avoid this place! Trashy!
data.text: I have been here a few times hoping it would get better. The VDJ's are a joke!!!!! They alternate the same pre-recorded music set every other weekend. The "hype girl" stands on stage and plays on her phone! The strobe lights are WAY to powerful. The bartenders are the only thing good about this place! I didn't expect much from the night life in Huntsville though! I drive back to Knoxville most weekends now to go to The International.

data.title: Douche bags in charge!
data.text: I have a friend who is disabled and in a wheelchair who went to Sammy T's to have some fun after going through some really rough times. She was treated horribly by Sammy Taylor and Sammy Taylor jr. They didn't want to accommodate her and made her feel like less of a person because she was in a wheelchair. This is not acceptable and I will never be back to Sammy T's. I refuse to spend my hard earned cash in a place like this! I wish there was a way to give them negative stars for this!

data.title: Turn up
data.text: Was in Huntsville for a hockey tourney. . Went to Sammy T's Saturday night. Loud live dj blasting edm.  Bar.  Dancing. Etc.  Highly recommend if into the night life scene.
